actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: A bill to increase the authorization of appropriation for the Magnet School program for fiscal year 1987 to meet the growing needs of existing Magnet School programs, and for the establishment of new Magnet School programs.

summary.text: Amends the Education for Economic Security Act to increase and extend the authorization of appropriations for the Magnet Schools Assistance Program through FY 1989.

titles.title: A bill to increase the authorization of appropriation for the Magnet School program for fiscal year 1987 to meet the growing needs of existing Magnet School programs, and for the establishment of new Magnet School programs.
